plot: Marge becomes jealous when Lisa begins idolizing her old high school friend, Chloe Talbot, a famous reporter.

Marge's old school friend Chloe Talbot,now a famous journalist,returns to Springfield and Marge feels envious because Lisa spends so much time with her. However when Chloe and Lisa are trapped after the volcanic Mount Springfield has erupted Marge proves that she may not be famous but she can still be heroic.—don @ minifie-1
